title: Squash Puff
directions: Boil/Steam/Whatever squash until soft, and mash it.
Sautee onion in butter until limp.
Beat in egg yolks and milk to squash mixture.
In separate container mix flour, baking powder, salt, and pepper.
Combine flour mixture to squash mixture.
Beat egg whites until stiff peaks
Fold in egg whites to squash mixture with a spatula.
Butter oven safe dish and pour mixture into dish.
Put in oven and bake for 25 minutes or until top is golden brown.
